name: FYP
description:
The idea of the game was to be similar to Caravaneer, an old flash game.(https://www.kongregate.com/games/sugarfreegames/caravaneer)

With turn-based combat and an openworld sandbox experience for the rest of the game. I chose to do this for my FYP as I believed it would provide a sufficient challenge for me but also be completable to an alpha stage within my final year.
